scripts.validate-template: source config/config.$EnvName.env && aws cloudformation validate-template  --profile $AWSProfile --template-body file://template.cfn.json
scripts.create-stack: source config/config.$EnvName.env && aws cloudformation create-stack --stack-name h2x-$EnvName-stack --profile $AWSProfile --template-body file://template.cfn.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=Ec2InstanceKeyname,ParameterValue=$Ec2InstanceKeyname ParameterKey=EnvName,ParameterValue=$EnvName
scripts.wait-create-stack: source config/config.$EnvName.env && aws cloudformation wait stack-create-complete --stack-name h2x-$EnvName-stack --profile $AWSProfile
scripts.update-stack: source config/config.$EnvName.env && aws cloudformation update-stack --stack-name h2x-$EnvName-stack --profile $AWSProfile --template-body file://template.cfn.json --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=Ec2InstanceKeyname,ParameterValue=$Ec2InstanceKeyname ParameterKey=EnvName,ParameterValue=$EnvName
scripts.wait-update-stack: source config/config.$EnvName.env && aws cloudformation wait stack-update-complete --stack-name h2x-$EnvName-stack --profile $AWSProfile
scripts.describe-stack: source config/config.$EnvName.env && aws cloudformation describe-stack-resources --stack-name h2x-$EnvName-stack --profile $AWSProfile --output json --query 'StackResources[*].{LogicalResourceId:LogicalResourceId,PhysicalResourceId:PhysicalResourceId,ResourceStatus:ResourceStatus}'
scripts.delete-stack: source config/config.$EnvName.env && aws cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name h2x-$EnvName-stack --profile $AWSProfile
scripts.wait-delete-stack: source config/config.$EnvName.env && aws cloudformation wait stack-delete-complete --stack-name h2x-$EnvName-stack --profile $AWSProfile
